Window

Class TSelectItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • Support.TItem
      • Window.TSelectItem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IItem

    public class TSelectItem
extends TItem
    Extended implementation of IItem used typically in select box graphical components. The class extends the general purpose TItem class. In one item instance the key associated to both the value of the item and the caption
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Sandor Kalmanchey
